io.libraft.agent
Interface CommandSerializer

public interface CommandSerializer

Implemented by a class that converts a Command instance into its corresponding binary representation.

Implementations must be thread-safe. Ideally, calls to serialize(Command, OutputStream) would not modify any internal state.

Method Summary
 void serialize(Command command, OutputStream out)
          Serialize the Command into binary to the given OutputStream.
 

Method Detail

serialize

void serialize(Command command,
               OutputStream out)
               throws IOException
Serialize the Command into binary to the given OutputStream.

Implementations can assume that out contains enough space to hold the fully-serialized command.

Parameters:
command - Command instance to be serialized to binary
out - OutputStream the Command should be serialized to
Throws:
IOException - if there was an error serializing command to out
